channel.title: Homes on Rafael Angarita
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Rafael Angarita

item.description: Biography I am an Associate Professor at Isep since September 2017, where I am a member of the RDI (Research and Development in Information technology) team and the head of the Information Systems track. I am also an Associate Researcher at Inria, MiMove team, where I was a postdoctoral researcher before joining Isep. I obtained a Ph.D. in Computer Science from the University Paris-Dauphine - PSL Research University in December 2015 and a Master’s Degree in Computer Science from the Simon Bolivar University.

item.title: Service
item.description: Track Chair Software Systems, Models and Architectures at the 7th IEEE International Conference on Future Internet of Things and Cloud (FiCloud 2019), Istanbul, Turkey. August 2019. Program Committee The 4th International Conference on Internet of Things, Big Data and Security (IoTBDS 2019), March 2019. The 4th IEEE International Conference on Collaboration and Internet Computing (IEEE CIC 2018), Philadelphia, USA, October 2018. The 3rd IEEE International Conference on Pattern Analysis and Intelligent Systems (IEEE PAIS’2018).

item.title: Team
item.description: Along with the permanent members of MiMove@Inria and Lisite@Isep, and all my scientific collaborators, I work or have worked with: PhD students Grigorios Piperagkas, Inria Paris. September 2018 - Postdoctoral Researchers Ehsan Ahvar, Inria Paris. Postdoc. July - Shohreh Ahvar, Inria Paris. Postdoc. July - December 2018. Research Interns Alexandre Dejous, Isep. Internship: Blockchain for product registration in collaboration with the UN Environment. September - December 2018.

item.title: Events
item.description: Coach & Jury & Local organization. Olympiades de l’Open Innovation Isep. 14-16 December 2018. Promenade Numérica Issy-les-Moulineaux. 14 September and 12 October 2018. Coach & Jury. Olympiades de l’Open Innovation Isep. 23-24 November 2018. Hustle Isep. Expert@. UN Environment. Technology and Innovation Dialogue- Exploring Blockchain Technology and Environmental Sustainability, Paris, France Coach@Startup Weekend Civic Tech Paris, Paris, France, 20-22 April 2018 Civic Engagement@InOut, InOut Rennes 2018, Hôtel de Rennes Métropole, Rennes, France, 15 March 2018

item.title: Teaching
item.description: Before joining Isep, I taught several Computer Science courses at undergraduate and graduate levels at Simon Bolivar University, Paris-Dauphine University and Nanterre University.
